overview:
Mr. Bhartiya has over 30 years of professional experience in Internet/Intranet applications development, network design and evaluation, network requirement analysis planning and implementation, information systems design and implementation.

He has led initiatives in various technical endeavors for EER Systems Corporation, Poly-Qual Engineratics, and was a consultant to the Government Planning Commission in India for many large scale projects. As CEO/President of REI Systems, Inc. for over 10 years, he has led the organization in successful ventures combining the realms of information systems and the Internet.

Mr. Bhartiya received his M.S. in electrical engineering from Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) in 1975, and his B.S. in electronic and telecommunications engineering from Allahabad University, India, in 1970.
